Outcome: Plaque at 6 to 7 months (Quigley–Hein Plaque Index)
Gingivitis at 6 to 9 months (Löe–Silness Gingival Index)

Reasons for GRADE if not High: Single study at high risk bias with 95% CI including both an effect favouring the intervention and the control

Outcome: Coronal caries increment at 24 to 36 months (decayed filled surfaces – DFS)
Calculus at 6 months (Volpe–Manhold Calculus Index in mm – mean total calculus per participant)
Reasons for GRADE if not High: 2 studies (1 at high and 1 at unclear risk of bias) with high heterogeneity (I2 = 91%)
